meanings.definition: The tendency to consider oneself as the center of one's universe.
meanings.sent1: Her egocentrism made it difficult for her to understand others' feelings.
meanings.sent2: His egocentrism often led to conflicts with his friends.
meanings.sent3: In a funny twist of egocentrism, he believed the world revolved around his pet hamster.
meanings.sent4: The egocentrism of the toddler was like a black hole, sucking in all attention.
meanings.sent5: The professor's egocentrism was so extreme that he thought the sun rose just for him.
